name: Dawn of Decentralization
description:
In 2009 Satoshi Nakamoto gave the world decentralized money. In 2021, when the Akash Network mainnet launched, Overclock Labs gave the world a decentralized internet. Commemorate the dawn of decentralization with this 1/1 piece depicting Akash floating down into the hands of mankind, beginning to cross between two distinct mediums: hope into reality.

This is one of two colorways for the Akash NFT collection. These are the FIRST Akash NFTs in existence. Original purchase comes with an optional small, physical copy signed by the creator as proof that you were the first owner of the first Akash NFT in existence. A third NFT will be minted as an Akash video.
